        {
            "Role": "Standby",

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyBackupPlan
<公共请求参数>

{
    "BackupPeriod": [
        "tuesday",
        "monday"
    ],
    "BaseBackupRetentionPeriod": "7",
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-xxxxxxxx",
    "MinBackupStartTime": "01:00:00",
    "MaxBackupStartTime": "02:00:00"
}

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceChargeType
<公共请求参数>

    "AutoVoucher": 0,
    "Period": 1
}

ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig.document: 主从同步方式采用半同步，设置允许切换的最大延迟，允许退化为异步复制

Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-32d4mmv9",
    "SyncMode": "Semi-sync",
    "MaxStandbyLatency": 10737418240,
    "MaxStandbyLag": 10,
    "MaxSyncStandbyLatency": 1073741824,
    "MaxSyncStandbyLag": 5
}
ModifyDBInstanceHAConfig.title: 修改为半同步，允许退化为异步复制

}

RestoreDBInstanceObjects.document: 在原实例上指定恢复时间，恢复某些数据库相关对象。例如在postgres-abcd1234实例上，恢复时间点2024-03-25 01:27:35上的user数据库。
RestoreDBInstanceObjects.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: RestoreDBInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-abcd1234",
    "RestoreTargetTime": "2024-03-25 01:27:35",
    "RestoreObjects": [
        "user"
    ]
}
RestoreDBInstanceObjects.title: 指定恢复时间，恢复数据库对象

RestoreDBInstanceObjects.document: 在原实例上选定备份集，恢复某些数据库相关对象。例如在postgres-abcd1234实例上，使用备份集28aa61ac-1b1f-566a-bedb-6e918024be02恢复user数据库。
RestoreDBInstanceObjects.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: RestoreDBInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-abcd1234",
    "BackupSetId": "28aa61ac-1b1f-566a-bedb-6e918024be02",
    "RestoreObjects": [
        "user"
    ]
}
RestoreDBInstanceObjects.title: 选定备份集，恢复数据库对象

POST / HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json

}
SetAutoRenewFlag.title: 设置自动续费

Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com

UpgradeDBInstanceKernelVersion.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpgradeDBInstanceKernelVersion
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "pgro-g7w4itfg",
    "TargetDBKernelVersion": "v12.7_r1.5",
    "DryRun": "true"
}
UpgradeDBInstanceKernelVersion.title: 升级版本号

UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersion.document: 实例当前大版本号为10，需要使用PostgreSQL 15的相关特性，则可以通过大版本升级功能将实例的内核版本从10升级到15，并在指定时间窗内执行升级。
UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersion.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersion
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-qwe12k98",
    "TargetDBKernelVersion": "v15.1_r1.6",
    "UpgradeCheck": false,
    "BackupBeforeUpgrade": true,
    "StatisticsRefreshOption": 0,
    "ExtensionUpgradeOption": 0,
    "UpgradeTimeOption": 1,
    "UpgradeTimeBegin": "01:00:00",
    "UpgradeTimeEnd": "02:00:00"
}
UpgradeDBInstanceMajorVersion.title: 升级实例内核大版本
